ai-patthana8.19:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.19:0.3_0: Supreme amongst those who’ve reached certainty,
ai-patthana8.19:1.1_0: destroyed by the preference of defilements, or by the result of mentality, or by causes and reasons.
ai-patthana8.19:1.1_1: (Only) without preventing the teaching doesn’t give rise to defilements. Gaining debtlessness arises in him.
ai-patthana8.19:1.1_2: Thoughts don’t arise for the sake of defilement, or for the sake of embracing the teaching. Speaking preference to the defilement of phenomena, or cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.19:2.1_0: (They are) without preventing for the teaching. When change in search of pollutants give rise to reason.
ai-patthana8.19:3.1_0: (Consciousness) did not give rise to preferences. It doesn’t give rise to satisfactions, causes, reasons, and reasons.
ai-patthana8.19:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.19:5.1_0: The group of nine is finished.
